Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client

Class BoardRepresentation

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.BoardRepresentation
public class BoardRepresentation
extends java.lang.Object
Representation of the Board on the client side. It is a simplification of the board: it contains an array of integers instead of tiles and the workers are substituted by their colors.

      Parameters:

      x - x coordinate of the worker
      y - y coordinate of the worker

    • isThereAWorker

      public Color isThereAWorker​(int x, int y)
      Checks if there is a worker on a tile and in such case it returns its color, retrieved from the PlayerRepresentation
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate to check
      y - y coordinate ot check
      Returns:
      Color or null

    • moveWorker

      public void moveWorker​(java.lang.String username, int fromX, int fromY, int toX, int toY)
      Moves the worker of the specified player from a position to the other
      Parameters:
      username - Player moving a worker
      fromX - Initial position of the worker
      fromY - Initial position of the worker
      toX - Move destination
      toY - Move destination

    • buildTile

      public void buildTile​(int x, int y, Action action)
      Updates the client's board to build on a tile. The building player is not specified ever since such process is validated on the model, so that it is unnecessary to check the validity here. If the construction reaches level 4, a dome is placed instead.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate to build on
      y - y coordinate to build on
      action - Action.BUILD or Action.BUILDDOME(for Atlas)

    • setLoser

      public void setLoser​(java.lang.String username)
      Sets the specified user as loser and removed it form the map of players
      Parameters:
      username - losing player

    • setWinner

      public void setWinner​(java.lang.String username)
      It sets the specified player as winner and sets the other to losers.
      Parameters:
      username - winning player
